title: Zhengquan Cheng
text:
Dr. Cheng’s research interests lie in the fields of labor economics and behavioral economics, with a strong emphasis on integrating big data with economic theories to study individual decision-making, including judicial rulings, criminal activity, household finance, and human capital investment.
He has published in journals including Journal of Economic Behavior & Organization, Finance Research Letters, Asia Pacific Journal of Human Resources, and South China Journal of Economics (Chinese in 南方经济).

Education

Ph.D. in Labor Economics, Xiamen University
M.A. in Labor Economics, Southwestern University of Finance and Economics
B.A. in International Economics and Trade, China Jiliang University
